description: Devold® Thermo is a comfortable jacket with superior insulating abilities. This is a garment for those who enjoy outdoor activities in all kinds of weather. The jacket has gussets for maximum mobility, and extended sleeves with thunbholes. Devold® Thermo jacket consists of 100 % pure, new wool and is designed as an insulating mid-layer, but can also be used as an excellent outerwear on cold and dry days.
name: Devold Thermo Wool Vest - Mens
